001
002package io.sphere.sdk.client;
003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.function.Function;
008import java.util.function.Predicate;
009
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
011
012import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpResponse;
013import io.sphere.sdk.json.SphereJsonUtils;
014import io.sphere.sdk.models.SphereException;
015import io.sphere.sdk.models.errors.ErrorResponse;
016
017public class CompatExceptionFactory {
018
019    private final List<HttpResponseExceptionResponsibility> responsibilities = new ArrayList<>();
020
021    CompatExceptionFactory() {
022    }
023
024    private CompatExceptionFactory when(final Predicate<HttpResponse> predicate,
025            final Function<HttpResponse, SphereException> exceptionCreator) {
026        return this.addResponsibility(predicate, exceptionCreator);
027    }
028
029    private CompatExceptionFactory addResponsibility(final Predicate<HttpResponse> predicate,
030            final Function<HttpResponse, SphereException> exceptionCreator) {
031        HttpResponseExceptionResponsibility r = new HttpResponseExceptionResponsibility(predicate, exceptionCreator);
032        this.responsibilities.add(r);
033        return this;
034    }
035
036    private CompatExceptionFactory whenStatus(final int status,
037            final Function<HttpResponse, SphereException> exceptionCreator) {
038        return this.addResponsibility((response) -> {
039            return response.getStatusCode() == status;
040        }, (response) -> {
041            return (SphereException) exceptionCreator.apply(response);
042        });
043    }
044
045    private static String extractBody(final HttpResponse httpResponse) {
046        return (String) Optional.ofNullable(httpResponse.getResponseBody()).map((b) -> {
047            return HttpResponseBodyUtils.bytesToString(b);
048        }).orElse("");
049    }
050
051    public static CompatExceptionFactory of() {
052        CompatExceptionFactory exceptionFactory = (new CompatExceptionFactory()).when((r) -> {
053            return isServiceNotAvailable(r);
054        }, (r) -> {
055            return new ServiceUnavailableException(extractBody(r));
056        }).whenStatus(401, (r) -> {
057            String body = extractBody(r);
058            return (SphereException) (body.contains("invalid_token") ? new InvalidTokenException()
059                    : new UnauthorizedException(body, 401));
060        }).whenStatus(403, (r) -> {
061            return new ForbiddenException(extractBody(r));
062        }).whenStatus(500, (r) -> {
063            return new InternalServerErrorException(extractBody(r));
064        }).whenStatus(502, (r) -> {
065            return new BadGatewayException(extractBody(r));
066        }).whenStatus(503, (r) -> {
067            return new ServiceUnavailableException(extractBody(r));
068        }).whenStatus(504, (r) -> {
069            return new GatewayTimeoutException(extractBody(r));
070        }).whenStatus(409, (r) -> {
071            ErrorResponse errorResponse = (ErrorResponse) SphereJsonUtils.readObject(r.getResponseBody(),
072                ErrorResponse.typeReference());
073            return new ConcurrentModificationException(errorResponse);
074        }).whenStatus(413, (r) -> {
075            return new RequestEntityTooLargeException();
076        }).whenStatus(400, (r) -> {
077            String body = extractBody(r);
078            if (body.contains("invalid_scope")) {
079                return new InvalidTokenException();
080            }
081            else {
082                ErrorResponse errorResponse = (ErrorResponse) SphereJsonUtils.readObject(r.getResponseBody(),
083                    ErrorResponse.typeReference());
084                return new ErrorResponseException(errorResponse);
085            }
086        }).whenStatus(404, (r) -> {
087            return new NotFoundException();
088        }).when((response) -> {
089            return true;
090        }, (r) -> {
091            return new SphereException("Can't parse backend response.");
092        });
093        return exceptionFactory;
094    }
095
096    private static boolean isServiceNotAvailable(final HttpResponse httpResponse) {
097        return httpResponse.getStatusCode() == 503
098                || (Boolean) Optional.ofNullable(httpResponse.getResponseBody()).map((b) -> {
099                    return HttpResponseBodyUtils.bytesToString(b);
100                }).map((s) -> {
101                    return s.contains("<h2>Service Unavailable</h2>");
102                }).orElse(false);
103    }
104
105    public <T> SphereException createException(final HttpResponse httpResponse, final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest,
106            final ObjectMapper objectMapper) {
107        HttpResponseExceptionResponsibility responsibility = (HttpResponseExceptionResponsibility) this.responsibilities
108                .stream()
109                .filter((x) -> {
110                    return x.getPredicate().test(httpResponse);
111                })
112                .findFirst()
113                .get();
114        return (SphereException) responsibility.getExceptionCreator().apply(httpResponse);
115    }
116}
